content: For the standard Questionnaire, you can see the full structure in the "Resource Content" section (http://hl7.org/fhir/2018Sep/questionnaire.html). Is there place one can see the full structure of the SDC questionnaire? All I can find (from http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/sdc/2018Sep/index.html) are lists of extensions.
Thanks, Eric! I had been starting from http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/sdc/2018Sep/index.html and did not see how to get to it. (Now I have found it under the Table of Contents link.)
